modName: Spooky Edits - Circlets Amulets and Rings (WIP)
summary: I'm attempting to make these textures behave a bit more like my brain says they should ;) .. very much a work in progress
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] The way some skyrim textures work is inverse to the way I feel they should be, this is hopefully a start in the right direction

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Update Plans :[/b][/color] Possibly break the normal gold and silver objects into 2 separate textures and finish off all the amulets...

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] You can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Possible Conflicts :[/b][/color] This one replaces a lot of the meshes (to add custom reflections) as well as the textures so you need to double check for conflicts!

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] I use an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url].


[center][color=Lightsteelblue][b](: More Spooky Edits :)[/b][/color]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57178/?]
